14 #include <opencv2/opencv.hpp>
15 #include <pcl_ros/point_cloud.h>
16 #include <pcl/point_types.h>
17 #include <pcl/filters/voxel_grid.h>

21 #include <pses_kinect_filter/KinectFilterConfig.h>

23 typedef pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> PointCloud;
24 typedef pcl::PointXYZ PointXYZ;
25 typedef pses_kinect_filter::KinectFilterConfig FilterConfig;

37 void dynReconfCallback(FilterConfig &inputConfig, FilterConfig* outConfig, uint32_t level) {
38  *outConfig = inputConfig;
39  // If an even kernel size was selected, add 1 to make it odd.
40  if (outConfig->median_kernel_size % 2 == 0) outConfig->median_kernel_size += 1;
41  ROS_INFO("Reconfigured kinect filter params");
42 }
43 
50 void kinectCallback(const sensor_msgs::Image::ConstPtr& rawImgPtr, sensor_msgs::Image* procImg, FilterConfig* filterConfig){
51  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
52  try{
53  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(*rawImgPtr, rawImgPtr->encoding);
54  }catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e){
55  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
56  }
57 
58  // Apply a median filter using the OpenCL libraries of OpenCV
59  cv::UMat imgIn = cv_ptr->image.getUMat(cv::ACCESS_READ);
60  cv::UMat imgOut;
61  cv::medianBlur(imgIn, imgOut, filterConfig->median_kernel_size);
62 
63  // Convert the data back to a ROS Image and store it in procImg
64  cv_bridge::CvImage cvi;
65  cvi.header = rawImgPtr->header;
66  cvi.encoding = rawImgPtr->encoding;
67  cvi.image = imgOut.getMat(cv::ACCESS_READ);
68  cvi.toImageMsg(*procImg);
69 }
70 
77 void pointCloudCallback(const PointCloud::ConstPtr& rawPointCloud, PointCloud::Ptr cloudFiltered, FilterConfig* filterConfig) {
78  PointCloud::Ptr cloud (new PointCloud);
79  std::string tf_frame;
80  *cloud = *rawPointCloud;
81  pcl::VoxelGrid<PointXYZ> vox;
82  vox.setInputCloud(cloud);
83  // The leaf size is more or less the size of voxels. Note that these values affect what a good threshold value would be.
84  vox.setLeafSize(filterConfig->leaf_size, filterConfig->leaf_size,filterConfig->leaf_size);
85  // This limits the overall volume of points. Being "far away" points considered as irrelevant.
86  vox.setFilterLimits(filterConfig->min_filter_limit, filterConfig->max_filter_limit);
87  // The line below is perhaps the most important as it reduces ghost points.
88  vox.setMinimumPointsNumberPerVoxel(filterConfig->min_points_per_voxel);
89  vox.filter(*cloudFiltered);
90  ros::param::param<std::string>("~tf_frame", tf_frame, "base_link");
91  cloudFiltered->header.frame_id = tf_frame;
92 }
93 
101 void infoCallback(const sensor_msgs::CameraInfo::ConstPtr& cameraInfo, sensor_msgs::CameraInfo* output, ros::Subscriber* infoSubscriber) {
102  *output = *cameraInfo;
103  // Stop subscribing the camera info topic after the getting the first camera info message.
104  infoSubscriber->shutdown();
105 }
106 
107 int main(int argc, char **argv){
108 
109  // Init ROS
110  ros::init(argc, argv, "kinect_filter");
111  ros::NodeHandle nh;
112 
113  // Init image transport
114  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
115 
116  // Variables declarations/inits
117  sensor_msgs::Image procImg;
118  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo cameraInfo;
119  PointCloud::Ptr cloudFiltered (new PointCloud);
120  std::string depth_image_topic;
121  std::string camera_info_topic;
122  std::string output_depth_image_topic;
123  FilterConfig filterConfig;
124 
125  // Init dynamic reconfigure
126  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<FilterConfig> reconfigureServer;
127  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<FilterConfig>::CallbackType f;
128  f = boost::bind(&dynReconfCallback, _1, &filterConfig, _2);
129  reconfigureServer.setCallback(f);
130 
131  if (!ros::param::get("~depth_image_topic", depth_image_topic))
132  {
133  ROS_ERROR("Depth image topic was not provided!");
134  return -1;
135  }
136 
137  if (!ros::param::get("~camera_info_topic", camera_info_topic))
138  {
139  ROS_ERROR("Camera_info topic was not provided!");
140  return -1;
141  }
142 
143  ros::param::param<std::string>("~output_depth_image_topic", output_depth_image_topic, "kinect2/depth_filtered");
144 
145  ros::Subscriber kinectImg = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Image>(depth_image_topic, 1, boost::bind(kinectCallback, _1, &procImg, &filterConfig));
146  ros::Subscriber kinectInfo = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::CameraInfo>(camera_info_topic, 1, boost::bind(infoCallback, _1, &cameraInfo, &kinectInfo));
147  image_transport::CameraPublisher kinectDepthPub = it.advertiseCamera(output_depth_image_topic, 1);
148  ros::Subscriber kinectCloud = nh.subscribe<PointCloud>("/kinect_filter/points", 1, boost::bind(pointCloudCallback, _1, cloudFiltered, &filterConfig));
149  ros::Publisher kinectCloudProc = nh.advertise<PointCloud> ("/kinect_filter/points_filtered", 1);
150 
151 
152  ros::Rate loop_rate(35);
153  while(ros::ok()) {
154 
155  kinectDepthPub.publish(procImg, cameraInfo, ros::Time::now());
156  kinectCloudProc.publish(cloudFiltered);
157  ros::spinOnce();
158  loop_rate.sleep();
159 }
160 
161  return 0;
162 
163 }
